# Get the original data

```{r, echo = TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)

gapminder
```

# Import the HIV data

```{r}
library(readr)
hiv <- read_csv("data/gapminder_hiv.csv")

```

# What is the relationship between HIV prevalence and life expectancy?

```{r}
#do full join to add rate column
inner_join(gapminder, hiv) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(hivRate, lifeExp)) + geom_point()+ geom_smooth()

```

# Which continents have the most countries with missing HIV data?

```{r}
gapminder_new %>%
group_by("continent") 

anti_join(gapminder, hiv)

gapminder_new %>%
  filter(is.na(hivRate))

na_count1 <- sum(is.na(gapminder_new)) 

gapminder_new %>%
  select(everything()) %>%  
  summarise_all(funs(sum(is.na(.))))

gapminder_new %>%
  rowwise %>%
  summarise(NA_per_row = sum(is.na()))

apply(gapminder_new, MARGIN = 1, function(x) sum(is.na(x)))
```
